RepresentativeComplaints.Description: 2004 FORD EXPLORER NBX.  OWNER PUT CAR IN PARK AND GEAR SHIFT LEVER CAME OFF IN HAND.   CAR TRANSMISSION STUCK BETWEEN PARK AND REVERSE.  HAD TO GET CAR TOWED TO DEALERSHIP.  DEALER STATES THEY HAVE FIXED NUMEROUS EXPLORERS WITH SAME ISSUE IN THE RECENT P
